name: UIViewControllerContextTransitioning
desc: A set of methods that provide contextual information for transition animations between view controllers.

items.name: var containerView: UIView
items.desc: The view that acts as the superview for the views involved in the transition.

items.name: func viewController(forKey: UITransitionContextViewControllerKey) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns a view controller involved in the transition.

items.name: func view(forKey: UITransitionContextViewKey) -> UIView?
items.desc: Returns the specified view involved in the transition.

items.name: func initialFrame(for: UIViewController) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the starting frame rectangle for the specified view controller’s view.

items.name: func finalFrame(for: UIViewController) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the ending frame rectangle for the specified view controller’s view.

items.name: var isAnimated: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the transition should be animated.

items.name: var isInteractive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the transition is currently interactive.

items.name: var presentationStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: Returns the presentation style for the view controller transition.

items.name: func completeTransition(Bool)
items.desc: Notifies the system that the transition animation is done.

items.name: func updateInteractiveTransition(CGFloat)
items.desc: Updates the completion percentage of the transition.

items.name: func pauseInteractiveTransition()
items.desc: Tells the system to pause the animations.

items.name: func finishInteractiveTransition()
items.desc: Notifies the system that user interactions signaled the completion of the transition.

items.name: func cancelInteractiveTransition()
items.desc: Notifies the system that user interactions canceled the transition.

items.name: var transitionWasCancelled: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the transition was canceled.

items.name: var targetTransform: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: Returns a transform indicating the amount of rotation being applied during the transition.

items.name: struct UITransitionContextViewControllerKey
items.desc: The keys you use to identify the view controllers involved in a transition.

items.name: struct UITransitionContextViewKey
items.desc: The keys you use to identify the views involved in a transition.
